Once in a lush, green jungle, there lived an elephant named Ellie who had a peculiar problem: she forgot everything. Each day, she would wake up and forget where she had hidden her favorite snacks, or even the names of her friends. One sunny morning, Ellie decided to embark on a quest to remember. She painted colorful signs on trees, marking her favorite spots, and sang songs to help her recall her friendsâ€™ names. As she shared her journey with the jungle animals, they all joined in, creating a beautiful symphony of memories. Together, they learned that sometimes, forgetting can lead to wonderful new adventures.
